text: Chintha Lakshmi Sinhaarachchi () is a Sri Lankan writer who is best known for her translation of Bengali novels to Sinhalese. ==Works== ===Translations=== * Mawathe Geethaya (Sinhala මාව‍තේ ගීතය) Sinhala translation of Pather Panchali * Aparajitha Jeewithayak (Sinhala අපරාජිත ජීවිතයක්) * Apuge Lokaya (Sinhala අපූගේ ලෝකය) * Binduge Daruwa (Sinhala බිංදුගේ දරුවා) * Isiwaraya (Sinhala ඉසිවරයා) * Shri Kaantha (Sinhala ශ්‍රී කාන්ත) * Shri Kantha Ha Raja Lakshmi (Sinhala ශ්‍රී කාන්ත හා රාජලක්‍ෂ්මී) * Aranakata Pem Banda (Sinhala අරණකට පෙම් බැඳ) * Gora (Sinhala ගෝරා) * Go Danaya (Sinhala ගෝදානය) ===Other works=== *Rabindranaatha Takur Saha Bauddha Sanskruthiya (Sinhala රබීන්ද්‍රනාථ ඨාකූර් සහ බෞද්ධ සංස්කෘතිය) ==References== Category:Sinhalese writers Category:Sri Lankan translators Category:20th-century Sri Lankan writers Category:20th- century Sri Lankan women writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
